rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with North-facing door, designed for a welcoming Vastu-compliant approach. Features elegant Art Deco elements.

rooms.name: Living & Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan area merging the living room and kitchen. The design includes Art Deco detailing with streamlined forms, a marble-tiled floor, modern appliances integrated into cabinetry.
features: open to garden through large sliding glass doors
art deco style fixtures and furnishings

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable master bedroom designed as a bachelor pad, incorporating Art Deco elements like geometric patterns and chrome accents. It includes built-in storage solutions.

openings.description: The main entrance door that adheres to Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.
Large sliding windows that connect the living area to the garden, providing ample natural light and an outdoor feel.
A fixed window in the kitchen area to enhance ventilation and natural light.

rooms.name: Upper Living Area / Study
rooms.description: A versatile space on the first floor that can serve as an additional living area or a study. It maintains the Art Deco aesthetic with streamlined furniture and modern lighting.

openings.description: Casement windows that allow cross-ventilation and enhanced natural lighting.
Door leading to a small balcony with garden views and fresh air.

rooms.name: Garden Area
rooms.description: A large garden area complementing the duplex house, featuring a blend of landscaped zones with native plants and water features that follow Vastu principles for relaxation.

openings.description: A stylish Art Deco gateway that provides access to the garden and enhances the overall aesthetic.
